caption: So bad long wating time
Mama Mia the best grandma pizza I had in a long time.
The food is really good . I loved it
Nice food good Alfredo. A nice place to get something quick rather than stay though
Very , Sarcastic Owner The Website obviously says the store close at 10 but they stop taking orders @ 9:20. I don’t think that is fair ,especially during a pandemic for that I’m giving one star. 👎🏽
Great pizza and good customer service
Eggplant rollatini tastes like adobo and so salty nasty nasty 🤮

I ordered a Chicken Masala. It did not taste like a chicken masala. In fact, the mushrooms were expired. The dish had such a bad odor. We also ordered Chicken Parmesan, the chicken was over cooked and burnt. The dish had no flavor. The garlic bread barely had garlic flavor. The only thing that came out good was the Nutella churros.
It's worth stopping in

Food is AMAZING! Staff is suuuuuper friendly and funny. They always keep you informed as to how long an order will take. And the food is ALWAYS nice n hot. Luconi NYC is one of the BEST pizzerias in the Bronx. As long as the staff stays the same and the management, they've got a customer for LIFE!

I know this is NYC and can expect anything but my experience with the man behind the counter and his girlfriend at a table was something from a horror movie, and thats an understatement ! Its Tuesday November 24th between 6 and 7pm. I recommend not going in there when this thug is working. I have been in there when a another man was on duty, completely human experience I do hope the owner is reading this and take this complaint most seriously !
THE ABSOLUTE BEST SLICE EVER!!!!!! AND THEIR PASTA DISHES ARE HANDMADE TO ORDER AND OUT OF THIS WORLD🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

The Food and Service is great Love the Pizza, perfectly baked crust with a sweet and tangy sauce with lots of cheese 🍕 😋 The buffalo wings are awesome they also come in lots of different flavors I've tried them all they're all great but Buffalo and spicy habaneros so far are my two favorites. Super Cool and professional and friendly staff. All at a Great location in Little Italy The Bronx
Double check your purchase before you leave  did not receive my garlic knot
Surely a place worth stopping over, the food is excellent and well prepared, the prices are convenient and it is consistently clean here. Great work.

If i could give it zero i would. I was starving and was craving some pizza and ordered from here a large pie and my total was like $45 and honestly the only thing that was good was the wings, the pizza was truly bad, and some of the toppings and cheese even slid off the pie and clumped together in the middle. Took one bite and threw it out, the 5 stars gotta be fake.

New owners are so caring . They  really care about customers satisfaction . They feed their community not just with food but with hospitality. Food is always delicious  and warm . Salads and other pasta dishes are also delicious .
The food was delicious with generous portions. I recommend to all for American Italian cuisine.
This place is great. Definitely worth it.
The news owners have really made this place something special. Staff is friendly, pizza is extremely good, and they’ve been able to handle all of my special orders. Highly recommended!!
Such delicious food the carolina gold bbq wings are my fav!  looking forward to my next order!
I love the wings, penne alla vodka, pizza, and the desserts! We order frequently almost twice a week and really have with the food/service.  Keep up the delicious food.

The food is delicious. The pizza and wings are amazingly good. I have been ordering from Luconi for a while now and the food is always delicious and fresh and the portion sizes are very large.  You really get your money's worth. I would totally recommend Luconi to anyone who wants great food and service.
Amazing food fresh and hot! Delivered on time definitely recommend!!!
Buffalo wings smell n are amazing. Wasn’t sure what to expect from this place but we were very happy with price, taste, quality and cleanliness. Highly recommend this place.
Buffalo wings are soooo good. Thick Pizza has great crust n great taste.  Finger licking GOOD

They had a load of orders but still managed to bring my food warm & threw in TWO free sodas! They care about representation! The manager called to make sure I got my food and apologized about the short delay! I can tell customer service is important here. Delicious food at affordable prices I mean this place is amazing. Thanks again!

Ordered fresh pie went to pick it up earlier then advised to. When I walked home 5 blocks away I looked at it, it seemed like an old pie they just put new cheese on and reheated it. Against my better judgment I gave it a shot it was terrible. Ended up throwing the whole thing away, stay away from this place.
Best pizza in the Bronx. Under new ownership finally.
At first we loved the pizza until I got a pizza uncooked (the crust was dough)

Their pizza is so yummy. BUT this is the 2nd time that something is in my food that wasn't supposed to be there. The first time i caught can aluminum pieces in my pizza! I could have choked. The second time I ordered Penne Vodka with mushroom and I found pieces of what looked to be red meat. It's a shame they need to be more careful.

Actually went here prior to going to Mario's pizza 3 stores down for my lunch break. I should have seen the warning signs upon entering this dim lot establishment. Mario's was full of patrons either sitting and eating there meals or in line ordering, however this place was empty. The person working here .. a heavy set white lady was very kind and courteous. I ordered there $5.00 2 slice and a can of soda lunch meal. The pizza was hot (great) but the slice was super thin .. the sauce wasn't all that great. I was hungry so waste not want not the following day I tried Mario's which was more on par with what's expected of a slice of New York Pizza besides this is little Italy in the Bronx ... Unfortunately ☹️ I will not be returning...
Its thin pizza usually soggy

This is a small nice quaint little place. The pizza was delicious and there was a level of comfort there that made it feel like home. Take advantage of their moderately-priced lunch specials.. you have a selection of choices and you get enough food to fill the belly
Guy at the counter was cool af, pizza was great, and the place looked clean. Will definitely be going back.
Waste of money. They don't care about what they represent. How can they offer you this and call it great food.
Very good restaurant. Very authentic Italian cuisine and great pizza. Small cozy atmosphere.
Love this place
♥️ The fried Oreos. Great service good environment!
The Pizza is delicious and the quality was great too. Definitely my everyday go-to pizza place. (Try their meat lovers amd the regular cheese pizza)

I would give 10 star if google let me do! Amazing pizza. Good cheese good sauce good crust what would you want more! Ive tried almost everything and satisfied 100%. You should def try this place ! If you are craving for delicious pizza . Thats gonna be ur fav spot!!

The wings had no flavor the beef pattie was gross the meat taste like if they put hot sauce on it and the pepperoni knots didn’t have cheese on it by far one of the worse places I’ve had ever eaten from
Traveled just for the fried Oreos , great service
Slipping on delivery. Cold food
Good pizza, the sauce is sweeter than most pizza places.
The food I ordered was not even edible.  I wasted 17 bucks for food that was so saturated in oil I had to throw it out. Don't waste your money on this place.
Nothing special about this pizzeria. Food is edible but I wouldn't go out of my way for it. You can definitely find better pizza in the Bronx.

Hi all my experience in this place was exquisite I ordered a lasagna and brought my house to share with my mother. It was delicious, I recommend them, they will not regret it, I hope you enjoy them as much as my mom and I do!

Ordered large Sicilian pie delivered and paid with debit card. I asked if I can tip delivery person with debit card since I had no cash on me and was told, "Yes." I left a $6 tip with purchase price of pizza which was kept by store and never given to delivery person. I'm never going to buy there again and when I  see the delivery person in the neighborhood, I'm going to give him his $6 owed him.
Staff is friendly and attentive. Kids loved it. Pizza tasted amazing. I recommend it 1000%
The food is amazingly authentic the staff is super nice!! Super cozy place to sit back enjoy the food and just feel at home ! Best spot in the Bronx for sure!
Good pizza man
Was my job and it was great foood there but them wings😋👌
We order the family meal and they give us less food for what the menu said. The delivery was incomplete. The food was ok but we had to wait for one hour and 20 minuets and I live two blocks away.
Order a pizza! Came 2hrs later and super cold! Sauce was as sweet as candy 🤢 it wasn’t good! Staff were nice but pizza was no good! Sorry
Friendly staff and great food. Thank you guys!!!! Love the luconi pizza & the wings are amazing 🤗
They need to update the prices on their men and serve a better quality of food The female that works there is not a people person.  Very rude
Friendly staff that take care of you, and more importantly, amazing food, from their slices to their Nutella churros. 5/5 come again
Good place to grab a quick bite, good service and clean place.
Great pizza
The house salad is only lettuce tomatoes and onions the price is extremely outrageous! Asked for banana peppers on my hero- was not added.
Love the food OMG can't wait to go back family special is a great ordeal for a family to eat and relax from my trip from the Bronx Zoo
Best place to eat pizza in the Bronx period.
Amazing service and food
The pizza is amazing pasta wonderful BBQ pizza tasty and and orange float is the best drink Nutella Churros are really good yum go to the pizza shop and give good reviews
Nice place, great food...
#oldsmithbarbershopllc approved.
It was good to eat there

Ordered from here three times hoping it wouldn’t be like the first time. First time I ordered for a company meeting and it took an hour while the worker mentioned it being about 20 min. Second I tried again hoping for a better result because I believe in second chances. Nope it wasn’t better it was worse and finally ordered and it took 2 hrs to get and all three times it came cold...

I really do not like posting publicly but the delivery I received was a circus. It came at its eta which is the two stars. But the food I'm disappointed by. We ordered the chef special pasta, baked ziti, a house salad and garlic knots.  The chef special pasta, two manicotti, two ravioli, two stuffed shells in pasta sauce covered with mozzarella. The manicotti I liked, the stuffed shells I liked, the ravioli tasted strange, possibly because they were burned. The sauce was sweet which doesn t affect the review, and it was chunky, which I enjoyed very much, another reason for the 2 stars. The baked ziti was my roommate's, she states the pasta was undercooked, which is strange for a pasta dish that is cooked twice. The salad also my roommate's.  She enjoyed the salad, another reason for the two stars. The garlic knots, completely inedible. They were not very brown, they were completely burned.  And the cherry on top is that the containers the food was in arrived crushed and the food had shifted alot during the ride, almost as if there had been an abrupt stop and it had fallen, so all of the cheese that topped my pasta was stuck to the lid and the presentation was very sloppy.  I'm really hoping that today just happened to have been a bad day for the restaurant because I'm quite disappointed. The good reviews are what led us to order from them.
Official Food awwww summm......
their caesar salad is the bomb!! i will definitely be back!!
Food was great. Team was on point. Can't wait to go back and get more pasta!  Cheeseburger slice = AMAZING
Great prices. Good food. Awesome staff

Visiting the Bronx and came across this sheik pizzeria. I walked in and automatically felt as if I was in the downtown Manhattan area. The staff was very attentive and the food was delish!!!!! The pizza taste fresh a and authentic. Tortellini carbonara was creamy and cooked just right. Definitely will be back.
Friendly staff and delicious, reasonably-priced food. We've been here twice and had great experiences both times!
Food was great, will definitely order again The owners are very kind and one refunded us and personally delivered our order after an issue with a prior delivery

Ordered last night and hated the pizza. The sauce is as sweet as barbecue sauce so I'm not sure what they're using but I didn't even eat the entire thing. I also paid for and asked for extra cheese and there was about a handful, nothing extra.  The sauce has the same level of sugar/sweetness as ketchup so to say I've had better is an understatement. I guess I'll just bite the bullet and order from John & Joe's near Lydig and pray they'll deliver. One more thing to note, I live down the street and my pizza was cold. How is that even possible? It's a four minute walk to my door and the pizza was already barely warm. My zeppolis also had some sauce (maybe vodka sauce but I didn't order pasta so why that's even anywhere near my food is upsetting) and a piece of pasta on the container. Too many red flags and I left a tip before I discovered all this so wasted money galore.

Recently ordered food from here and had delivered . So far the quality was pretty good. Have only tried pasta classics thus far. Will be visiting venue in near future for pictures and commentary on customer service and venue. In addition, the food came piping hot when delivered which was awesome!

Originally I tried ordering from one of my favorite pizza spots and they called to tell me they couldn't complete my order. I was disappointed and decided I would give this place a chance after seeing it a few times on grubhub, but paying it little to no mind. I wasn't expecting much, pizza arrived shortly after the order and it was it fresh and hot.  I took the first bite and I was in heaven. I immediately shut off the movie I was watching, because this was better. The sauce, I don't know what they do to the sauce, but I don't think i've ever had sauce that good. The cheese was perfectly distributed and melted so properly that it was barely visible. I'm almost tempted to order another one for breakfast.  Best pizza I've had in this area by far. Hell, I'm almost tempted to call it the best I've had in the last few years, but I'll have to order it a few more times.  That place that couldn't complete my order is completely out the question. I'll be ordering from from here from now on.  If you're reading this though, lower your expectations. The pizza was great because it was great, but also because I had NO expectations. Reviews can set the bar so high you don't enjoy something. I don't even write reviews, but they deserve it. My initial thought was to call the store up and salute the guy that made it.  5 Stars. Would give more if a could.
Great food, friendly staff...it’s my 4th time back, and the food is excellent. Don’t believe everything you read on here, give Luconi a try and you won’t be disappointed!!! AC
Pizza is delicious!! Customer service is amazing. Definitely coming back!
Amazing food! I've tried everything on the menu so far and one dish is better than the next! Customer service A++++++
Great pizza .. must try the pasta!! And dont leave without getting fried Oreos
Amazing spot!...Everything on the menu is delicious!
To hot
It was my first time there and I'm definitely coming back! The food was wonderful. The music was lit and damn his smile (
Great pizza and cool vibe!

First of all, the vibe of this place is amazing! I walk in and I immediately feel like I'm transported to some chic hipster area in Brooklyn. The exposed brick and textured ceilings give the place a nice touch. As with most pizzerias, you can see the entire kitchen and everything looks spotless! Now for the food! I had the Luconi Slice, which was phenomenal. It's a super unique carbonara slice, which tastes as creamy and decadent as it looks. The crust is perfection and the the sauce is...well...you've got to try it for yourself! I also had a classic plain slice that would make any New Yorker proud! Perfect crust and the sauce, again, was amazing! Finally, the staff is great. I met the owner who was super down to earth and welcoming. For a new spot on the block, I have high hopes for this pizzeria!
